title: Having trouble updating
body: I've never had problems updating before. I dont understand what's going wrong. Can someone talk me through it?

replies.body: Thanks for the information here!  At 33%, the patcher is trying to download files but the error suggests that a bad or poor connection is blocking it.  Additionally, if the connection is bad then the repair tool can't apply fixes to bad files.  As a first step, go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your connection is strong and able to hold together.  Hopefully, this will get you fixed up, but let me know if you run into any problems!
